description: Class D sedan with all-wheel drive. The premiere show of the car took place at the Geneva Motor Show in March 2017.
overview: In order to call the external differences of the current version of the Q50 significant from the previous one, you need to be a fan of the brand. The shape of the radiator grille and the relief of the front bumpers have slightly changed. At the back, the design of the lanterns has changed - L-shaped dimensions have appeared; the shape of the rear bumper has also changed. As for the interior decoration, here the differences also need to be looked for: these are minor changes in the design of the steering wheel (lower spoke), as well as in the design of the gearbox selector. There is also a stitching on the front panel. That's all. But it's worth adding that the Sport and Sport Tech modifications are highlighted by a distinct front end design with a more aggressive front bumper and 19-inch wheels.

specifications.hint: Engine capacity refers to the volume swept by all the pistons of an engine, within their bores, from the top to the bottom of their travel.

specifications.name: Horse power(hp):
specifications.hint: Horsepower (hp) is a unit of measurement of power, or the rate at which work is done, usually in reference to the output of engines or motors.

specifications.name: Torque(Nm):
specifications.hint: Torque is a twisting force that speaks to the engine's rotational force and measures how much of that twisting force is available when an engine exerts itself.
